congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Kevin Christopher Newsom, of Alabama, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Eleventh Circuit.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 68 yeas to 26 nays (Vote No. 180), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
